plays.text: Penalty to Dan Boyle 2 minutes for High Sticking Maxim Afinogenov
Penalty to RORY FITZPATRICK 2 minutes for Hooking Brad Ference
Penalty to Jason Wiemer 2 minutes for Crosschecking Vyacheslav Kozlov
Penalty to Chris Gratton 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Viktor Kozlov assisted by Brad Ference
Penalty to Robert Svehla 2 minutes for Tripping Tim Connolly
Penalty to Jay McKee 2 minutes for Holding Niklas Hagman
Penalty to Erik Rasmussen 2 minutes for Hooking Bret Hedican
Goal scored by Viktor Kozlov assisted by Peter Worrell and Trevor Kidd
Penalty to Robert Svehla 2 minutes for Delay of Game(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Robert Svehla 2 minutes for Roughing Vyacheslav Kozlov
Penalty to Rob Ray 10 minutes for Misconduct(opposing player not identified)
